name: KleinISDSchoolCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask Klein I.S.D. when is the next day off?”
”Alexa, ask Klein I.S.D. do the kids have school tomorrow?”
”Alexa, ask Klein I.S.D. when do the kids have off in March?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: klein i. s. d.
des: This skill is for residents in the Klein Independent School District. Ask Alexa about questions about the school calendar. You can ask Alexa if the kids have school tomorrow, next week, or if there is school on a specific date. Ask Alexa to find out which days the kids are off in a particular month. You can even ask Alexa to tell when is the next day off, or when is the first or last day of school.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
